question: how could I cover up all the missed prayers,do I have to pray them or give sadaqa,
answer:
QUESTION
ANSWER


Share:
It is perform to perform the Qadhaa of all your missed Salaats. The payment of Sadaqah is for those who have passed away whilst they still have unfulfilled Qadhaa (missed) prayers. (Fataawa Mahmoodiyah vol.7 pg.191)

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
